comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:6.0.2) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0.2
Build ID: 20110902133214

Steps to reproduce:

When using print.css on a similar page the preview displayed two different layouts.  


Actual results:

The 3.6.x version was common across other browsers while the 6.0.2 version had issues with clumping data after a page break.


Expected results:

Print preview should have had the same style for both.

comments.raw_text: Pictures are useful to show what you are seeing but to do anything with this bug we need a URL or a testcase for this problem. https://developer.mozilla.org/en/Reducing_testcases
